workshoptitle: Use OpenTracing for Microservices with Helidon Utilizing Oracle Application Performance Monitoring

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create an APM Domain and obtain Data Upload Endpoint and Private Data Key
tutorials.description: Create an APM Domain and obtain Data Upload Endpoint and Private Data Key

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup a Helidon SE Application
Lab 3: Monitor traces and spans of the Application with APM Trace Explorer
tutorials.description: Monitor traces and spans of the Application with APM Trace Explorer

tutorials.title: Lab 5: View the trace with multiple services
tutorials.description: View the trace with multiple services

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
